subject: Skiing
Snow and Snowstorms
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: About four to six inches of heavy, wet snow fell in the mountains at Beaver Creek, Colo., conditions that would have made the 1.2-mile racecourse hazardous.
snippet: About four to six inches of heavy, wet snow fell in the mountains at Beaver Creek, Colo., conditions that would have made the 1.2-mile racecourse hazardous.
